children.subject: Email me (ishaan.srivastava@berkeley.edu) after Friday night, assuming you're unable to submit the form by then
Thanks for you reply. I was able to upload file today morning.

I filled up the form above and I am trying to upload my transcript. However the connection to Berkeley is extremely slow, so I am not able to upload my files and could not submit the form. May you please let me know the email address or an other way to upload the form.

Thanks

history.content:
If you did well in Data 100, academic interning is a great way of becoming part of the course staff, helping the next batch of students achieve mastery, and solidifying your own understanding of the course material.

Please fill out this form if you're interested in becoming an Academic Intern for Data 100 during the Fall 2020 semester! We're looking for students at UC Berkeley who have the potential to become tutors and UGSIs in future semesters.

Application Deadline: Wednesday 8/26/2020 at 11:59 PM

The weekly responsibilities of an academic intern include:
- 1 hour of preparation (e.g. doing weekly assignments ahead of time, consulting with the (U)GSI, etc)
- 2 hours of assisting in office hours

Thank you for your interest in academic interning! If you have any questions, followup below or send me an email at kagarwal2@berkeley.edu .
history.subject: Apply to be a Data 100 Academic Intern for Fall 2020
